post.title: Hacking __doPostBack
post.content: It started as a weblog entry describing an issue with the way ASP.NET’s __doPostBack method. Basically, the __doPostBack method doesn’t fire the form’s onsubmit event. But as I was writing the entry, I built a module that worked around the issue. So I posted the issue and the fix as an article and source code.
post.excerpt: It started as a weblog entry describing an issue with the way ASP.NET’s __doPostBack method. Basically, the __doPostBack method doesn’t fire the form’s onsubmit event. But as I was writing the entry, I built a module that worked around the issue. So I posted the issue and the fix as an article and source code.
